MAN.TITLE: mtlb_load
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: load variables from file with Matlab4 format.

DESCRIPTION.P: mtlb_load loads variables on file with Matlab4 formats.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: mtlb_load fname loads in scilab all variables stored in file binary fname.mat .

mtlb_load fname -ascii loads in scilab variable stored in ascii file fname, which must contain a rectangular array of numeric data, arranged in m lines with n values in each line. The result is an m-by-n matrix named fname .

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: mtlb_load xxx.yyy
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: mtlb_load xxx.yyy reads the ascii file xxx.yyy, which must contain a rectangular array of numeric data, arranged in m lines with n values in each line. The result is an m-by-n matrix named xxx.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: "stdio" value for fname doesnt redirect load from standard input.

DESCRIPTION.P: mtlb_load is superseeded by loadmatfile for binary files.

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer, INRIA
